fileUploader.dragDropDescription: Drag and drop or click to upload a file.

campaignApproval.description: Campaign approval results are provided within 48 hours of upload. From the brand dashboard, select applicants for your campaign. After the application deadline, announce selected creators within 24 hours.
campaignApproval.title: Campaign Approval

checkPerformance.description: Check the content and campaign performance on your brand page.
checkPerformance.title: Check Performance

provideFeedback.description: Provide revision requests within 48 hours after the creator uploads the first review. (Requests cannot be made after this period.)
provideFeedback.title: Provide Feedback

shipProduct.description: Ship the product within 2 days once the creator confirms the shipping address.
shipProduct.title: Ship Product

confimAddress.description: Confirm your shipping address within 24 hours after campaign selection.
confimAddress.title: Confim Address

confirmAddress.description: Confirm your shipping address within 24 hours after campaign selection.
confirmAddress.title: Confirm Address

maintenanceGuidelines.description: Keep the review published for at least 6 months.
maintenanceGuidelines.title: Maintenance Guidelines

reviewUploadSchedule.description: Upload your first review within 7 days of receiving the product. After reviewing the brand’s feedback, upload your second review within 7 days. Attach the final SNS URL when posting the second review.
reviewUploadSchedule.title: Review Upload Schedule

uploadReview.description: Upload your first review within 7 days of receiving the product.
uploadReview.title: Upload Review

creatorLevels.firstA: If your application is declined, please review the eligibility criteria and consider reapplying after addressing any areas for improvement.
creatorLevels.fistA: If your application is declined, please review the eligibility criteria and consider reapplying after addressing any areas for improvement.
creatorLevels.secondA: You can upgrade your account to a creator by submitting an application through your profile settings.
creatorLevels.secondQ: I joined as a user but would like to participate as a creator.
creatorLevels.thirdA: You can verify and update your shipping details in your account under the “Shipping Information” section.
creatorLevels.thirdQ: How can I become a Lococo Pro Creator?
creatorLevels.title: Creator Levels

penaltyPolicy.firstA: Creators who do not provide required shipping information after being selected as reviewers will be subject to a 6-month suspension from all Lococo activities after three occurrences.
penaltyPolicy.firstQ: Failure to provide shipping information when selected as a reviewer.
penaltyPolicy.fistA: Creators who do not provide required shipping information after being selected as reviewers will be subject to a 6-month suspension from all Lococo activities after three occurrences.
penaltyPolicy.fistQ: Failure to provide shipping information when selected as a reviewer.
penaltyPolicy.secondA: Creators who submit content past the specified deadline will face a 6-month suspension from all Lococo activities after three occurrences.
penaltyPolicy.thirdA: Creators who fail to submit content or submit content that does not meet the specified quality standards will face a permanent ban from all Lococo activities.
penaltyPolicy.thirdQ: Failure to submit content or submitting low-quality content.
penaltyPolicy.title: Penalty Policy

shipping.firstA: You can check your shipping details through your registered email.
shipping.firstQ: How can I check the shipping information I provided?
shipping.fistA: You can check your shipping details through your registered email.
shipping.fistQ: How can I check the shipping information I provided?
shipping.secondA: Once a shipping address has been submitted, it cannot be modified. Please contact Lococo for assistance.
shipping.secondQ: I entered the wrong shipping address. What should I do?
shipping.title: Shipping
